plot: The Kaiser is playing cards with King Albert of Italy, who loses, but is rescued by Miss Liberty Loan.
title: Stake Uncle Sam to Play Your Hand
plot_es: The Kaiser is playing cards with King Albert of Italy, who loses, but is rescued by Miss Liberty Loan.
original_name: Stake Uncle Sam to Play Your Hand
plot_en: The Kaiser is playing cards with King Albert of Italy, who loses, but is rescued by Miss Liberty Loan.
